00024 char  *usrErrCodes[]  = {
00025 /*  NO_ERROR    0   */    "",
00026 /*  EDOS        1   */    "Operating System Dummy",
00027 /*  ESYS        2   */    "C++ System Dummy",
00028 /*  ENOTMEM     3   */    "Not enough memory",
00029 /*  EWRCFG      4   */    "Wrong parameter",
00030 /*  EINPDAT     5   */    "Input data error",
00031 /*  EFNFND      6   */    "File not found",
00032 /*  EUNKNOW     7   */    "Unknown error",
00033 /*  EWRITE      8   */    "Can not write data",
00034 /*  ETASKIMP    9   */    "Can not do task",
00035 /*  EINDEX     10   */    "Index out of range"
00036 };

00040                    void usrErr(char *place,int  err)
00041 /*
00042   Displays error message to stderr and exits program.
00043 */
00044 {
00045   warning(place,err);
00046   sdfexit(1);
00047 }/* usrerr */
00048 
00049 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050                    void warning(char  *place,int  err)
00051 /*
00052   Displays warning message to stderr.
00053 */
00054 {
00055   cerr << "\n" << place << " : " << usrErrCodes[err] << " !\n";
00056 
00057 }/* warning */
00058 
00059 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060                void  **allocArray2(int xsize,int ysize,int itemSize)
00061 //
00062 // allocates two dimensional array of data objects of requested size.
00063 {
00064   void  **array;
00065 
00066   if( (array = (void**)calloc(xsize,sizeof(void*))) ==NULL)
00067     usrErr("allocArray2",ENOTMEM);
00068   
00069   void **colPtr=array;
00070   for(int i=0;i<xsize;i++,colPtr++)
00071   {
00072     if( (*colPtr = calloc(ysize,itemSize)) ==NULL)
00073       usrErr("allocArray2",ENOTMEM);
00074   }
00075   return array ;
00076 
00077 }// allocArray2  //
00078 
00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080                void  freeArray2(int xsize,void **toFree)
00081 //
00082 //
00083 {
00084   void **array=toFree;
00085 
00086   for(int i=0;i<xsize;i++,toFree++)
00087   {
00088 #ifdef sparc
00089     free((char *)*toFree);
00090 #else
00091     free(*toFree);
00092 #endif
00093   }
00094 #ifdef sparc
00095   free((char *)array);
00096 #else
00097   free(array);
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 }// freeArray2  //
